content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crossbow
inventory=[{"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "dragon_breath", "quantity": 22, "index": 11}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "diamond_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 33, "index": 25}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 28, "index": 29}, {"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 32, "index": 34}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "emerald_block", "quantity": 40, "index": 37}, {"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 42, "index": 40}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a crossbow, I need to craft acacia_planks. To craft acacia_planks, I need to place an acacia_wood in the crafting grid. I will move the acacia_wood from slot 19 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1
